data.title: Geoff Love. Big War Movie Themes.
data.meta_description: I had this record from new in 1971, but It had been lost somewhere. David was kind enough to buy me this replacement for my collection. So I have this and the Cassette version. I have always loved this album. Geoff and his Orchestra do the tracks as brilliant as the original sound track recordings. Also an unforgettable Cover illustrated by British Movie Poster Artist Tom Chantrell.
data.text: I had this record from new in 1971, but It had been lost somewhere. David was kind enough to buy me this replacement for my collection. So I have this and the Cassette version.
